alert.note: Alert for Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 2:25PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Brevard County through 300 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northern Merritt Island, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Cocoa, Sharpes, Merritt Island and Kennedy Space Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These types of funnel clouds are harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
